alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Montour; Northumberland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 6:51PM EDT until September 25 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Columbia County in central Pennsylvania... Southern Montour County in central Pennsylvania... Central Northumberland County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 651 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Riverside, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bloomsburg, Catawissa and Rupert around 710 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Snydertown, Espy and Bloomsburg University. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Limestoneville and Berwick-Lime Ridge exits, specifically from mile markers 220 to 236. This includes Route 11 from east of Northumberland to Bloomsburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
